channel.title: How can people connect to my server :(
channel.description: I tried making a server i read the tutorial did everything made a no-ip and done my variables and even downloaded a source i tried running server and asking my friend to see if he could get on but it doesnt let him :( anybody know how i fix this? on the tutorial it says u need to port forward if u have a router but i use a modem, BT.

item.title: How can people connect to my server :(
item.dc:creator: @crazynub crazynub
item.description:
@crazynub wrote:

idk if this will help (i read to fast)
so i had the same problem the firs thing ya need to dp is edit the run.bat by right cliking adn slection edit, make a new line adn put pause
then go lookign in he older tuts about the envirmantal varibles you have missed something that needs to be placed in the classpath or path…adn the port forwarding thing is my newest problem my pc when server is up works for e adn anorther pc in my house…but when tryign to put it on he server status page it sayes its not online in which im confuzed on how the portfowardign works adn what ip to place in and were…i did what it says on www.portforwarding.com…in so we have the same problem but im just a lil bit farther than you =( plzz help and i hope i helped in some way with these problems

Read full topic
